name: Almost a Hero - Idle RPG
description:
Looking for an idle RPG clicker game where you can become a daring adventurer with the battle skills of the greatest heroes ever forged in combat? Then keep walking, baby, this game ain't for you.

Almost a Hero prides itself on attracting unaccomplished twits who don’t quite fit in with the cool kids.

Evolve deeply flawed and emotionally broken characters. Turn absolute zeroes into slightly good heroes. Enjoy huge, thrilling battles. Unlock guarded secrets. Develop ancient magics. Get killed a lot. What’s not to love about Almost a Hero?

So if you’re more failure than fighter, more wally than warrior, or more silly than soldier, then we want to hear from you. This is where you’re meant to be. Join your true family in Almost a Hero.
